question: Identify the emerging technology trends being adopted across different industries and how companies are planning to focus their IT investments in those areas.

subtasks.task: Gather data on emerging technology trends across different industries from the IndustryITTrend table.
Analyze the details of companies' strategic focus areas on technology from the CompanyFocusAreaDetail table.
Extract financial metrics and planned IT budgets of companies from the CompanyInfo table to correlate with emerging trends.
Cross-reference the technology focus areas and IT budgets to identify which industries are investing heavily in specific trends.
